Thank you for your concern about the possibility of a PLA blockade and PRC coercion of Taiwan. As a responsible regional stakeholder, we are eager to work with like-minded partners, like the US, to defend regional and global peace & stability.

We stand firm with the @MoNDefense & all front-line members of the armed forces responding to the PLA provocations around Taiwan. We condemn the CCP's threat to regional & global peace, stability &  prosperity & will meet it with preparedness, alongside our democratic partners.
